item.title: Progress List

well I think I should spend more time working with 3D part of Godot game engine.

item.title: Godot 3D Doc notes
item.description: General To find a vector pointing from A to B, use B - A. Scalar Vectors represent both direction and magnitude (length).

item.title: Interestings
item.description: All the things that I want to as side jobs How to make package in flatpak Read the source code of maxwell spinning cat github Use the Dot() function in Gdscript and see how it works Make my note space on the web with jackyzha0/Quarts.git Work on the reactive version of my website eikoakiba Does more...

item.title: Why IndieWeb?
item.description: Greetings, have you ever ask yourself what is the purpose of creating handmade websites as a non-technical person using coding language likes HTML/CSS or even Javascript? well if it is then seems like you know what indie web is, but if you don’t know what exactly is that term, well I’ll got you.

item.title: Network programming with Go
item.description: Notes network topologies point to point (P2P) direct connection from one node to another daisy multi p2p connections hops the nodes between source and destination in t he daisy topology is called hops.
